column9: Description
Bog-standard attack you could find just about anywhere.
Hits target with such little self-preservation that it damages itself.
Uses a special liquid to heal the target.
Says farewell in a violent and powerful explosion.
Does more emotional than physical damage with a weak smack.
Nimbly evades the next attack that would hit it.
Prepares itself to take on any attack, boosting defense.
Slashes just once at the foe by using a sharp body part.
Exhales ghastly, superhot breath.
Exhales minty-fresh, ice cold breath.
Concentrates really hard in order to do more damage next turn.
Creates a gale of razor-sharp winds that can slice through most things.
Mub
Uses the target's worst fears against them to stop them from acting this turn.
Motivates the target with some genuine words of kindness.
Who knows?
Heals itself and its allies in a kind and loving manner.
Prepares a web to make enemies go last
Prepares a dam that will double defenses
Takes all attacks meant for team-mates this turn
Takes attacks meant for target this turn
Something's coming...
Prepares a chilling wind that will freeze enemies up, making them weak to BLOW.
Prepares some sweltering air that will melt enemies down, making them weak to SLASH.
Maybe something good will happen?
